CustomField.description: Indicates whether Goal time to Value was met or not
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Goal_Time_to_Value__c >= MVP_DATE__c, AND(ISBLANK(MVP_DATE__c), Goal_Time_to_Value__c - TODAY() > 15)), "On track", IF( AND(ISBLANK(MVP_DATE__c), Goal_Time_to_Value__c - TODAY() <= 15, Goal_Time_to_Value__c - TODAY() >= 0), "Approaching due", IF( OR(Goal_Time_to_Value__c < MVP_DATE__c, AND(ISBLANK(MVP_DATE__c), Goal_Time_to_Value__c - TODAY() < 0)), "Past Due", "N/A")))
CustomField.label: Time to Value Status
